title: SCP-953

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, pick a good slot. You will appear to be that role and will fool consigliere results.
- Hypnotizing a player will give them a random end-of-night message (I.E, "Someone occupied your night! You were roleblocked!",  "You were attacked but somebody fought off your attacker!", ect.) or redirect them to another player.

desc:
Post 1236
*In addition to polymorphic abilities, SCP-953 displays moderate level psionic abilities, namely suggestion and telepathy. Although insufficient to fool an outside observer, an entranced subject can be convinced of a variety of false facts, including the nature of SCP-953, its own nature, and the nature of things around it.*
